title: Holidays and Traditions

vocab.definition: A special day when people celebrate something important
Something families or groups do the same way year after year
To do special things to show something is important
A way of doing things that has been passed down over time

teachingNotes: Discuss various cultural celebrations and family traditions. Focus on respect for diversity and what makes celebrations special. Use calendar activities.

sample.question: What is a tradition?
